inn1.comm: pitches on just the right area first ball, less than a foot outside off stump, wobbles the ball away off the seam, and Sehwag shoulders arms
shorter in length, slanting into Sehwag, who taps it to square leg
back of a length, not much movement, played to cover ... but Mills has overstepped so we have an early free hit
oh well bowled, Mills! Thats a lovely yorker, just outside off stump, Sehwag opens the face and tries to jam it down toward third man but cannot make contact
first runs off the bat, a fluent cover drive, Sehwag just getting toward the pitch off a full delivery and pushes it into the gap for four, not hitting it hard at all
we have a fast outfield! Mills strays onto the pads, off a short length, and Sehwag just whips that away through square before fine leg can cut the ball off
better line and length, sits up and Sehwag awkwardly defends
good start, back of a length outside off stump and no shot offered
pitches on middle and straightens and thats turned to square leg
pitches on a length and slants into Tendulkar, who shuffles and tries to tap it away but cannot time it well and O'Brien runs across to cut off the single
extra bounce, pitches short of a length and surprises Tendulkar, who starts to lean forward and then has to jump back as the ball rears up off the deck
tidy length, middle and off, and watchfully defended back
good start for O'Brien, a maiden, as Tendulkar defends that one
short outside off stump, Sehwag opens the face and steers it over gully in the air down to third man, in fact had the fielder been more alert it could have been a catch
back of a length outside off, tapped to point, 'WAIT!' is the call
back of a length, much straighter, darts back in, Tendulkar again tries to tuck it to the on side but cannot time it and the ball rolls away near off stump
top shot, just getting over a full delivery and driving straight down the ground, mid-on runs after it and slides near the boundary
pitches it up just outside off stump and Sehwag leaves it be
short of a length on the stumps, Sehwag hops up and gets the wrists into play, turning the ball just past square leg for a single to retain strike
good ball, pitched up on a length and slanting back in from outside off stump, no footwork from Sehwag as he pushes at it loosely and gets beaten
a touch fuller and Sehwag is rooted to his crease as he swings and misses, he was looking to drill that over extra cover but just didn't get to the pitch
well bowled, this time he holds back the length and pitches closer to off stump and Sehwag defends it to cover
now he connects, slamming a fullish delivery over extra cover
a much better shot, and the way to deal with the full delivery, clipping it with hard wrists and just beating a running mid-on, top placement from Sehwag
back of a length on middle and leg and bunted to mid-on for one more
bang, thats four! Short, wide, and slashed away square behind point
better stuff from Mills, pitched up on a length and slanting it in, Sehwag quickly brings the straight bat down and pats it back down the track
just back of a length outside off and driven straight to point
starts off with a short delivery that gets Sehwag up onto his toes, and he does well to drop the ball down near his feet, that was well bowled by Mills
pitched up on a length, Sehwag drives from the crease, no footwork, its hit uppishly down the ground and takes a good dive from Vettori at mid-off to cut it off
just back of a length and gently pushed to point for a single
pitches it on a length to commit Tendulkar onto the front foot and he opens the face, running the ball down to third man for one more
short and wide and slashed down to Oram at third man
pitches on a length, off stump or so, and Tendulkar defends
gets across and turns a length ball off the stumps to midwicket
just short of a length, angling in, and Sehwag forces it to point
hops up and wrists a shortish ball off the hips behind square leg
similar shot as the last one, whipped off the stumps past square leg
gets tall and pushes a short ball straight to cover, yelling 'WAIT!'
this time he opens the face and steers the ball toward backward point
pitches just on off stump, back of a length, and Sehwag whips it away past midwicket for another single, with fine leg and deep square staying back
tighter delivery, back of a length on about middle and off, Sehwag again goes for that whipped shot but the ball gains on him and he cannot pull it off this time
swing and a miss, Sehwag backs away and exposes all three sticks, looking to smear that over cover but Mills holds back the length and Sehwag can't connect
short of a length outside off, dabbed toward Broom at backward point
shot! Banged in short and he latches on, pulling behind square
short and wide this time and he uppercuts it over gully, the ball drops in the deep and slows down and Oram, running from third man, drops to his knees and cuts it off

better ball, short and sliding in and he jumps up, looking to turn the ball to the on side, they set off and O'Brien, running to get the ball, collects with Sehwag, who goes down like a ton of bricks, the bowler collects and throws it at the stumps with batsman nowhere in the frame but cannot hit
he goes hard, he goes straight, he goes four! Pitched up on a length and there's no footwork but plenty of clubbing from Sehwag, who smacks it wide of mid-on
responds with a short ball which is tucked off the hips past square
dug in short on middle and off, Sehwag hops up and turns the ball down in front of square leg and responds to the call for a single that raises India's fifty in good time
one man clubs it, the other caresses! A clever shot, just opening the face and running the short ball very fine and gets four down to third man
fuller on middle and leg and worked into the on side for one
smacked! Short and wide, really a rubbish delivery, and Sehwag cracks it flat past point for half a dozen, thats his signature shot and the crowd loves it
big over! Mills is hit for more runs, veering a short ball a touch too straight and Sehwag gets outside the line to tuck it off the hips down to fine leg for four more
short of a length on the stumps and he whips it past midwicket
starts off short of a length and thats turned toward midwicket
short outside off stump and cut out to the deep cover sweeper
a much better length and Sehwag defends it into the off side gently

edged and taken! A nothing shot from Tendulkar, looking to steer that away behind square on the off side but the length ball sits up a touch more than anticipated and he feathers a regulation edge through to McCullum, and thats immediate success for Butler on ODI comeback
pitches back of a length and cuts back in to hit the top of the flaps as a rooted Dhoni misses out on the attempted whip across the line, McCullum appeals but he's the only one
straighter delivery and Dhoni defends from the crease
he's carted away for square leg for four first ball, dropping short and Sehwag gets up on one leg and swats it away, the midwicket sweeper fumbles and can't cut it off
pitched up this time and thats smoked over mid-on for four, wow!
well played, the ball pitches back of a length and Sehwag chops it late past the vacant gully region for a couple to third man
comes forward and just nudges the ball into the covers for one
beaten on the forward push, no footwork and the ball zips across
pitches it up and this time Dhoni pushes it into the covers
drifts down the leg stump and it clips the pads toward short fine leg
why would you bowl that? Another short and wide delivery gets the treatment, simply flayed over backward point to the boundary before anyone can move
onto the pads and worked out to deep midwicket for one
pitched up on a good length, Dhoni drives off the front foot to cover
a touch too short and slashed through backward point to the sweeper
nips back in off a length and a cramped Dhoni squirts it to point
comes forward and opens the face, running it down to third man
ah, so close! Dhoni hits the ball down the ground and it just evades a leaping mid-on's fingertips
a tad too straight so he brushes it off the pads to deep backward square
jumps across the stumps and turns a short ball toward midwicket
pitches on the stumps and he shuffles, working it to midwicket for one
short of a length on off stump and patted back to the bowler
short of a length on off stump and he knocks it to the on side for one
short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni gets back and forces it to the off side, and a super leap from Guptill to his left at cover saves certain runs
bouncer down the leg side, Dhoni pulls and misses, McCullum takes
tidy stuff, again short of a length and Dhoni can only play it to point
this time he finds the gap at cover with a force off the back foot
bad ball, a full toss down leg stump and Sehwag swings it past square leg, the sweeper runs across and flings himself full stretch to try and pull the ball back in but in vain
skips out first ball, Vettori sees him and fires it in, and Dhoni defends
a touch too short and Dhoni cracks it off the back foot into the covers
short again, Sehwag makes room and fiercely cuts to Elliott in the deep
too short and flat-batted with power through a fumbling mid-off
flat down leg stump and flicked away past square for one
tossed up down the pads and clipped in the air to square leg
back of a length and a touch wide, punched off the back foot to cover
short of a length down leg stump and swatted away to short fine
straighter delivery, darts back in and Dhoni works it right to midwicket

much fuller on middle and off, not much footwork from Dhoni as he looks to clip it away, he gets a thick inside edge which Butler doesn't hear, because he bellows out an appeal, meanwhile Sehwag is alert and calls Dhoni across for the quick single
pitched up on a length and Sehwag defends it back watchfully
walks right across his stumps, in fact outside off, and tries to swat a short ball away for six, doesn't time it all that well and the ball balloons just over a jumping McCullum
tossed up on a length, just outside off stump, Dhoni makes room and cuts but cannot connect on that one
a tad fuller, plenty of rotation, Dhoni pushes it to cover
short and wide, another fierce attempt to cut, another play and miss
thats the way to go! Now Dhoni connects, using his feet to get to the pitch of that one and club it straight back over Vettori's head
skips down but can't work the full and flat ball away off his pads
well bowled, flat and fast and Dhoni can only defend it back
pitches on off stump and he shuffles across, clipping past midwicket
still Dhoni continues to struggle, late on an attempt to nudge a ball off leg stump, it ends up rolling back to the bowler
short of a length and he drives it straight to cover
better shot, this one forced away off the back foot past cover
pitches back of a length on middle and off and turned past square
banged in short, Dhoni shuffles to try and knock the ball to the on side but nearly gets undone by the bounce, ends up fending it in front of midwicket and waves back Sehwag
flat down the stumps, he makes room and drives to the off side

stunning catch! Well held, Taylor! Sehwag skips down and absolutely smacks the ball hard and flat but Taylor dives to his left, superbly balanced, and plucks off a two-handed blinder at extra cover, you are not going to see much better than that in terms of reflex and composure
tossed up on the stumps and he turns the ball to midwicket
flatter on middle and off and clipped straight to midwicket again
tossed up on off stump, he again looks to turn the ball away but closes the face of the bat and ends up playing it to cover instead
too short and wide and he pounces, cutting square on the off side
pitched up on a length and he defends off the front foot to cover
back of a length and defended
back of a length and again played out
good ball, hits a length and holds it line to beat the loose prod
a tad wider, seaming away, he has a flirt and again misses
pitches on off stump and Yuvraj mistimes the drive back to Butler
fired in flat on the stumps and he flicks it past square leg for one
tossed up and defended
tossed up on the stumps, flicked but straight to midwicket for one
tossed up on a length and he plays it firmly to cover
too short and he cuts it out Elliott, on the move from cover sweeper
pitches outside leg stump and he paddles it toward short fine leg
pitched up on off stump and he plays it back to the bowler
just back of a length and Dhoni chops a cramped cut to cover
beaten this time, tentatively pushing at a length ball, no footwork
much fuller, middle and leg, Dhoni drives down the ground to Butler
pitches just back of a length on middle and off and Dhoni defends
comes two-thirds forward and squirts the ball behind point for one
tossed up on off stump and Dhoni defends with a big inside edge
a touch flatter, but on a good length, and Dhoni pats it back to Vettori
flatter, drifting down leg stump and Dhoni works it past midwicket

the hesitation does him in! Dhoni skips down and collects on the full, clipping past midwicket, there is hesitation on the second run and Yuvraj cannot make it back, beaten by a terrific flat throw on the bounce from Guptill to Vettori
flighted up on leg stump and he drives the ball to midwicket
tossed up invitingly, gets good dip, and Raina patiently defends
pitches middle and leg, turned just toward midwicket
shot! Pitched up wide and he slashes it over point for four
reaches out and squirts the wide half-volley down to Oram at third man
full on the pads and Dhoni turns it through square leg for a single
hits a length and comes in, Raina stands firm and pokes it to cover
back of a length outside off stump, Raina defends it to point
flat down leg stump, Dhoni skips out and mistimes the attempted clip
flat on leg stump, he comes forward and drives it to mid-on
well flighted on off stump and Raina turns it to midwicket gently
tossed up wider and he plays a pleasing drive straight to cover
flatter and shorter just outside off stump and he knocks it to midwicket
tosses it up on off stump and Raina again shuffles to work it away
starts off full on the stumps and Dhoni drives it down to long-on
good clean hit from Raina, clearing the front leg and teeing off the length ball over mid-on's head for four, that sped away to the ropes
now a streaky shot as he comes forward and looks to drive much straighter but ends up squirting an edge through the vacant gully region
pitches on a length outside off stump and Dhoni plays it to cover
pitched up on off stump, Raina presents a straight bat in defence and pushes the ball back back the bowler and the stumps, running hard
comes onto the front foot and plays the ball away firmly
well bowled, flat on middle and off, Dhoni pushes it toward cover
a tad shorter, spinning in, Dhoni makes room and chops it back
flat, short, he makes room and pushes it off the stumps to cover
too flat and Raina makes a mess of his attempted flat-batted pull
skips down, Vettori slows the pace, Dhoni works it off the pads for one
massive! Thats half a dozen in style as Raina finally connects with that free swing of the arms, picking that ball from outside off stump and depositing it rows behind midwicket
brings Dhoni onto the front foot and he drives straight to cover
a touch straighter, Dhoni gets over the ball and drives it to long-on
pitched up outside off stump and pushes on the rise past extra cover
comes onto the front foot and drives handsomely to extra cover
full just outside off stump, Dhoni squeezes it into the gap at cover
good shot, collecting on the volley and driving it down to long-on
serves up a full toss on off stump which Raina bunts to mid-on
another full toss that Dhoni swings through midwicket for one
pitched up outside leg stump and Raina heaves past midwicket
bad ball and thats how you deal with such trash! Mills continues with his third full toss of the over, this one very high, and Raina sends it way over midwicket for maximum
much better, nearly a yorker outside off stump, jammed to cover
low full toss on off stump, which Dhoni hits down past mid-on for one
overpitched outside off stump and driven down to long-on
well bowled, full on off stump and he digs it out to extra cover

well its been a while since I've seen that shot, its the Dhoni of old! Butler pitches on a length, perhaps a tad too straight, and Dhoni flips that with immense power and placement over midwicket, thats a shot only he plays
pitched up and he biffs it back past Butler for one more
spears in the yorker on leg stump, Raina clears his leg and jams it out to midwicket
sends down a full toss which Dhoni pulls out to deep midwicket
makes room and clubs the ball all along the grass past extra cover and it the fielders giving chase only have to retrieve the ball after it rolls into the advertising board
superb shot, Dhoni kneels across and sweeps the ball from outside off stump and with fine leg up in the circle he gets a boundary to bring up his half-century
now he unfurls the reverse-sweep, but cant beat short third man
thats outta here! Raina plays another smashing shot, smacking another Mills full toss over midwicket for his third six of the innings
uses his feet and collects on the full, scooping the ball, high elbow and all, down to Ryder at long-on on the bounce
exposes the stumps, Mills follows him smartly and Dhoni clips it away
overpitched, another swipe, but on the bounce to deep midwicket
full and wide and he square-drives it loosely towards point
full toss down the pads, swatted out to Oram at deep fine leg
overpitched well wide of off, he toe-ends it down to Oram again
slides down the pads, he miscues the pull but beats short fine leg
pitches fuller and he clips with the swing out to deep midwicket
gets forward and on-drives the ball towards midwicket
fired in flat on leg stump and he turns it away off the pads
flights it up outside off and Raina laces it past cover to raise his fifty
speared down leg stump, no room to work with, and Dhoni defends
quicker, flatter, heading for middle stump but Dhoni cuts to cover

what placement, even though he falls down! Vettori drifts it up at a yorker length outside off stump, Raina opens the face and runs it down, losing balance as he does so, and beats short third man in the process, what an innings
clumped! Raina is lighting up Napier, this one's a monster hit over mid-on, just kneels down and swings against the turn, immense hitting from the young man
pitches up on the stumps and he hits it back, very straight, to long-on
another attempted yorker outside off stump, Raina backs away and cannot connect this time, McCullum does the collecting
pitched up wide, Raina kneels down and chases but can't connect
great fun, he just frees his arms and steers it down past gully
gets room again and square-drives into the gap between cover and point
overpitched on leg stump, Dhoni on-drives a single
swing and a miss, clears the front leg but cannot make contact
a tad short, a slower ball too, and he pulls it superbly past midwicket
much fuller and he clears the leg, swatting toward midwicket again
pitched up wide, Raina gets down and slams it over extra cover
well bowled, a yorker on middle stump, and well dug out too for one
he's gone now, but what a contribution! Raina clears the front leg and gets underneath the ball, slogging it up into the evening sky and O'Brien settles underneath it on the off side
full on the pads and clipped uppishly past midwicket
short down leg stump and he miscues the pull to deep fine leg
back of a length, sliding down leg stump, whipped to square leg
very well bowled yorker, Pathan makes room and just manages to dig the ball out, it starts to trickle to the off side and Dhoni urges him down for the single
clears the leg and heaves a full delivery across the line to midwicket
pitches on a length and Pathan swings it to a sliding midwicket
looking Mexico, going Morocco! Pathan clears his leg and looks to swing that much straighter but gets a thick leading edge that just evades O'Brien at short third man

pitches on a length, again he swings, again he miscues it, the ball clips McCullum on the fingers and he looks to be in pain, the ball rolls to short third man and out comes the magic spray for McCullum
clubs a low full toss past midwicket, Broom slides near the ropes to field
again he has a free club and Broom reacts faster to keep him to one
full on the pads and flicked up, up in the air and its over deep square leg
nearly a yorker outside off stump and Pathan swings and misses
very full and straight and he swings an inside edge to deep fine leg
good shot, just gets across in anticipation of the full delivery and paddles it from outside off stump, beating a tumbling short fine leg
gets low to swing a low full toss over midwicket, Guptill slides in the deep
hits a better length and Pathan heaves an inside edge to square leg
cracking shot, all wrists, hoicked back down very flat and straight and another good dive from Guptill down in front of long-on saves a boundary
good ball to end the over, pitched up very full and Dhoni digs it to mid-on, runs hard and takes on the fielder for the second and gets it too, thats superb running from Dhoni

inn2.comm: pitched up a touch wide and Ryder chops a cut to backward point
pitched up fuller this time and Ryder punches the ball to cover
beaten by a gem, pitched up on a length and deviating away after pitching, Ryder chases it and cannot connect
a tad short and he pulls from outside off stump, right to midwicket
good ball, much fuller and darting back in to Ryder, who plays to point
gets some width and slaps it hard but can't beat Raina in the covers
pitches it up a few feet outside off, swings away, McCullum leaves
good one, pitches on a length much closer to off stump and comes back in, beating McCullum as he pushes down the wrong line
just back of a length, tapped to Yuvraj at backward point
pitches and swings back in sharply, hitting McCullum above the knee roll as he walks a few steps down the track

gone! Praveen strikes in his first over, McCullum gets underneath the ball as it slides down the stumps, top-edging a poor attempt at a pull, its up into the evening sky a long time and settles in Harbhajan's palms down at deep fine leg, a massive wicket that
pitches it up on a length and Ryder defends it back
full outside leg stump and coolly picked up off the toes, past square
fuller, wider, angling across Guptill, who doesn't offer a stroke
just back of a length and he steers it straight to gully
swing and a miss, feet going nowhere as Ryder heaves at a full delivery just outside off stump
pitches on off stump, he pushes it to midwicket
lucky that, an edgy drive at one pitched up just outside off stump, Ryder looks on as the ball takes the inside edge and rolls back past leg stump
pitches on middle and off, swings late, turned with an inside edge
pitches on middle and moves away, defended off the front foot
just hits a length and commits Guptill forward and defending
a jaffa, pitching just outside off stump and jagging back sharply, cutting Guptill in half as he pokes and misses, and that just cut back over the top of middle stump
pitches it up fuller and wider and swings it away further, wide called
pitches on a length outside off and he runs it to backward point
beaten by one that hits a length and gets some extra bounce, Guptill's feet went nowhere as he pushed at that one and he's fortunate not to get an outside edge
tidy stuff, back of a length on off stump and defended down the track
pushes forward and away from the body and the ball sneaks past bat
another ugly swipe across the line, the length is not on for such cross-batted shots, it pitches and goes under the bat as Ryder has a swing and misses
just wide enough for Ryder to thump it off the back foot, its well struck and a leaping effort from Raina at cover takes pace off it and saves runs too
pitches on leg stump and straightens and Guptill defends it back
good ball, pitching marginally outside leg stump and swinging, Guptill pokes at it and edges it into the off side
pitches up on the stumps and Ryder defends it down the track
super shot! Just tees off and drills the length ball very, very hard in the air wide of mid-off, no one could have cut that beast off, it was so well struck
feet don't move and he chases a wide one, dragging it down to point
pitched up wide and swinging away, no shot offered, wide not called
too straight and Guptill tucks it off the pads toward square leg
pitches it up outside off stump and he drives it to Raina at short cover
comes forward tentatively and pushes the ball to extra cover, the fielder has a shy but cannot hit the stumps
very full outside off stump, jammed out to Raina at short cover
pitches on off stump and he clips it with the swing, past midwicket, the ball slows down near the ropes
short ball outside leg stump, pulled off the shoulder of the bat
short and wide and he slashes it in the air down to third man
much, much fuller on off stump and Ryder drives it to extra cover
pitches wide of the stumps, Guptill reaches out and chops to point
a much straighter delivery, again Ryder misjudges the length and heaves across the line, getting an inside edge back onto where it really hurts ... ouch
slower delivery, cutting away from middle and off, beating a waft
poor shot, just throwing the bat at a hint of width and scooping it up miles into the air, Sehwag calls for it and pouches the skier with ease on the off side, India are all over New Zealand
pitches on a good length and commits Guptill to a defensive shot
comes onto the front foot and runs the ball straight to point
starts off on a length and the ball wobbles away, no shot offered
gets cramped and under-edges a cut shot into the ground close to off
reaches out and square-drives a full one but cannot find the gap
short, wide and smashed with superb placement between cover and point
straighter delivery and he works it off the stumps to midwicket
initially comes forward and then waits, forcing the ball to cover-point
pitches short of a length and he sensibly nudges to cover for a single
pitched up and firmly driven out to Gambhir on the cover boundary
goes onto the back foot and chops a short ball to the off side
pitched up fuller and he defends off the front foot to cover
full again, on off stump, and Guptill pokes it toward cover again
and then he goes and plays a stunning shot like that, just swivelling to pull the length ball over midwicket, thats his strong area and he rarely disappoints hitting there
full and wide and he slaps the drive between cover and point to Gambhir
comes onto the front foot and squirts a length ball to cover
pitched up and he uses too much bottom hand in his drive to cover
a tad wider and Guptill square-drives hard behind point for a single
pitched up in the slot to be driven and Guptill goes downtown hard
overpitched on the pads, Guptill on-drives the ball sweetly into the window between mid-on and midwicket and two fielders give chase
a touch too wide and he laces it in front of point, more work for Gambhir
a touch too short and thats pulled off the front foot, very hard and flat
pitches on a length and slides in and he knocks it to midwicket
gets across and turns this one away to the on side
pitches very straight and again he turns it away for two
too far down the pads and he'll have to bowl that one again
comes onto the front foot and threads the gap at cover for a couple
tossed up a tad short and thats cut into the covers
fired in full and flat and he clips it just wide of midwicket for one more
flat again, the shot is late, Dhoni appeals, struck high down leg stump
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and pushes to cover
flat on middle and off, beats everything, scooting past the bat and pad
works this one off the pads for a single
drops it short outside off, makes room and slashes it away uppishly wide of point, raced away to the boundary that
flighted on the off stump, driven off the front foot wide of short cover
short of a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot
pushed into the off side short of cover for a single
and again, eased into the gap between cover and point for a run
short of a good length outside off, opens the face to guide it wide of point for a single
on middle and leg, turned away behind square for a run
bowled with a flatter trajectory outside off, makes room and lofts it between long-off and deep cover for a couple
tossed up outside off, driven straight to short cover, a fumble allows them to scramble a couple
just a fraction full outside off, makes room and drives it cleanly to deep cover
good length on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
short on the off stump, turned away wide of midwicket for a single
on middle and leg, tucks it away wide of short fine
spun down leg, he tried to slog that over midwicket, missed it, so did the keeper, brushed his trousers to beat the short fine fielder who gives chase and cuts it off
full on middle and leg, worked away but straight to midwicket
flighted on middle, is down the track and drives it down the ground to long-on for a single

gone! Tossed up on middle and leg, gets down on one knee and tries to sweep it away behind square, gets the top edge and the ball lobs up to Tendulkar at short fine where it pouches it comfortably. India are chipping away here, and the asking rate has climbed to almost 9
short on middle and off, rocks back and pulls it away to deep square leg
loopy delivery, really slow through the air bowled on a good length outside off, gets forward, closes the face, and pushes it back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, makes room and cuts it wide of cover for a single
good length on middle, turned away wide of square leg for a single
quicker one on middle and leg, angling down, strikes him on the pads as he tries to work it away behind square, stifled appeal promptly ignored
opens the face to guide it wide of point
full outside off, drilled to deep cover for a single
quicker on bowled flat on middle, pushed back to Yusuf
flighted on middle, driven off the front foot to midwicket, they get a single off the misfield
fired in outside leg stump, swept straight to short fine, Tendulkar rockets a throw to the non-striker's end but he's well in
turned away fine, deep square leg cuts it off running to his left
charged down the track, saw him come down and fired it in on leg stump, clipped his pads on the way to short fine
marginally short on the off stump, spins into him and he whips it away to deep square leg for a single
flighted outside off, struck firmly off the front foot wide of deep cover
full outside off, comes down the track and slices it away to deep point
quicker ball bowled on a good length on middle, pushed through the vacant midwicket region, they have enough time to get back for the second before the ball gets to long-on
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of short cover
flighted on middle and leg, turned away wide of short fine
bowled flat outside off, lands full, he gets down and drags it wide of deep midwicket for a couple
given a wide, just slightly down leg, tries to clip it fine, misses
tossed up on middle, driven to Harbhajan at long-on
good length on middle, held its line, pushed back to Yusuf
and again, the ball stopped at him a bit, pushed at it hard but mistimed it straight back to the bowler
short and wide, makes room and cuts it away wide of deep point for a couple
chipped into the deep short of deep midwicket for a single
flighted on the off stump, reverse-paddles it wide of point for a single
tossed up outside off, comes down the track and chips it towards deep cover
short of a length outside off, chops it to the same fielder again, content on getting singles and two's these two, at least for the time being
goes for it this time, landed on a good length on middle, angling into the right hander, tries to sweep it hard, gets a thin edge onto his thighs
tossed up on middle, comes down the track and mistimes a loft to long-on, thet get a couple though

short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to deep cover, Raina rockets in an accurate throw at the striker's end, Dhoni collects it on the half-volley and takes off the bails to find Elliot just short of his ground while coming back for the second

gone first ball!! A bizzare dismissal really, tossed up on middle, tries to sweep it square, gets the top edge that lobs up to Dhoni, who the flicks the ball onto the bails to find Oram short of his crease. There was plenty of bat involved in that one, so he's given out caught, no doubts there
short outside off, cuts it away to deep cover, gets to his fifty, well played
driven down the ground to long-on
full outside off, tries to sweep it away behind square, struck on the back pad and they scamper a leg bye, stifled appeal but the impact was outside off
full outside off, quicker through the air, makes room and slices it away over point for a couple
missed opportunity, full toss on the off stump, mistimes a pull to Raina at deep midwicket
full outside off, makes room and drags it down the ground to long-on
beamer!! Went for the slower one and it slipped out of his hand,  given a no-ball, no bad blood between anyone there, a genuine slip that
full outside off stump, a meaty length ball, tries to slog it away over midwicket, fails to make contact
full outside leg, swings at it wildy, misses and is struck on the pads, they get a leg bye
yorker just marginally outside leg stump, doesn't bring his bat down in time, is hit on the pads but the impact is outside leg
fullish on middle and off, drives it through the midwicket region for a couple
full on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted outside off, comes down the track and lofts it cleanly over mid-off for a one bounce four
superbly hit, Harbhajan saw him come down and fired it full on the legs, he just clipped it over square leg for a boundary, adjusted well in the end

tossed up on middle, goes for a slog sweep in an attempt to clear the ropes, gets the top-edge and Gambhir, running in from deep midwicket, takes a well-judged catch after a juggling it a couple of times

on a hat-trick now! Failed to pick the doosra, pitched on a good length outside off, Broom came down the track and played inside the line, expecting it to spin into him, he missed and Dhoni made no mistake
almost! The doosra again, tossed up outside off, lands a touch short, Mills just hangs his bat and the ball moves away to just beat the outside edge

A dream over for Harbhajan! Thrown up on the off stump, lands on a good length, he pushes at it off the front foot, gets a thick edge and Sehwag at slip stretches well to his right to snap a sharp chance, all but over for New Zealand here, three in four balls

disaster for the home team! Banged in short on middle, he tries to hook that behind square, gets the top-edge and Munaf at fine leg dives forward to complete an excellent catch, it was dying on him but he got under it nicely
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
full on leg stump, tries to flick it away fine, misses and is rapped on the pads
full and wide, drives hard at it from the crease, misses again
full on leg stump and sliding down further, tries to clip it off his pads, misses but settles for a leg bye
tossed up outside off, reaches forward and chips it just over Harbhajan for a single
short and wide, dabs it off the back foot wide of slip, Zaheer slips as he tries to stop that and the batsmen manage a couple
short outside off, quicker delivery, attempts a similar shot but misses
on and outside off, makes room and chops it behind point for a single
tossed up outside off, lands on a good length, O'Brien tries to dismiss it to the deep-midwicket boundary, gets an inside edge wide of short fine for a single
well played, an arm ball bowled short outside off, cuts it away off the back foot between cover and point for three more
full on middle, almost yorked himself there, dug out back to Yuvraj
flat on middle and off, gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps it over midwicket, well struck
full toss on leg stump, swept away over square leg for a one bounce four, some lusty blows, but of little consequence
very slow through the air, is into the slog sweep a little too early, ends up getting an inside edge through the keeper for a couple wide of short fine
short outside off, comes down the track and slaps it wide of Yuvraj, and down the ground for a boundary, he's doing a good job boosting his overall strike rate here
low full toss on leg stump, driven to long-on for a single
full toss outside off, swats it to deep cover for a single
tossed up outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
flighted on middle and off, tries to work it away to midwicket, it's the doosra that zips away to just miss the off stump
full on the pads, turned away wide of short fine for a single
short and wide, cut away through point, the fielder there fumbles, and they get a couple
quicker ball bowled full on the off stump, driven down to long-off
